name: Black Cycle
description:
Consumers have power.

A 10-minute walking simulator game about how we usually consume.

The game depicts a simple cycle in which things are created and consumed. You will play as a member of a manufacturing company and observe how society changes through the cycle. Through conversations with people in various positions in mass consumption society such as a boss, consumers, a recycling company, and influencers, you will reaffirm the social impact of our consumption behavior.
